overview: When Duncan Saint sees hot MILF Crystal Rush washing her fancy car, he gets a good look at her big booty as she's bent over soaping up the hood. Kyle Mason has been looking for a chance to say hello to the hot blonde MILF with the massive tits who moved in down the street, so when he smells the sweet aroma of cookies wafting out of her house, he can't help but introduce himself! Sean Lawless doesn't go to open houses because he needs a new house, but because he wants a new home for his dick! Anna Morna's in a hurry and the elevator is a no-show, so she decides to take the stairs, but she gets locked in! Sexually frustrated MILF Alexis Fawx isn't satisfied with the job new gardener, Charles Dera, is doing in her yard, so she marches outside to tell him a thing or two about how to work his hose.
title: Drilling Mommy 8
